data.name: Fm45's Sprite Man Adventures
data.detailed_description:
Level up and defeat the boss!
​In this game you will run around chopping enemies, dashing into them, and shooting arrows. Pick up chests around the map to earn health, exp., and even coins! Use coins to buy a crossbow, a diamond sword, health, or exp. from the mini shop! 14 achievements to get and 5 hard and fun challenges to complete! Will you be able to defeat the boss?!

Gameplay
Swing your sword, shoot enemies with your crossbow, quickly dash around, level up and get stronger. Each run can take over 10 mins to complete!
​
This game includes
  • ​14 Achievements
  • 5 Challenges/Modes
  • 5 Original songs to jam out to
  • Auto-save
  • Hours of fun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Professional x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (sixth generation or newer) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
